Caption: K.T. Chandy (Director, Board of Governors) addressing the audience at the Special Convocation. On the dais, from left: Mr. Sethunathan, Prof.Sampath, Dr.Edhard Eppler, Mr. Subramanian (Union Minister), K.A.V Pandalai (Director), Prof. Ramachandran
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
